texts.QA:Title: Frequently Asked Questions
texts.QA:Q1: How do I get my certificate?
texts.QA:A1: Once you complete all modules and pass the final assessment, your certificate will be generated automatically in your profile.
texts.QA:A2: Yes, our advanced system uses AI to ensure fair and secure examination environments.
texts.QA:A3: Absolutely! We offer flexible payment plans starting from 3 up to 12 months.

texts.FAQ:MainDesc: Find quick answers to common questions about our platform and services
texts.FAQ:Q1: How do I reset my password if I forgot it?
texts.FAQ:A1: Go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email address and we'll send you a password reset link.
texts.FAQ:Q2: Where can I find my course materials?
texts.FAQ:A2: After logging in, navigate to 'My Courses' from the main menu. Select the desired course and check 'Learning Materials'.
texts.FAQ:Q3: Can I access tadriccom on my mobile device?
texts.FAQ:A3: Yes, the platform is fully mobile compatible. You can access it via browser or download our app.
texts.FAQ:Q4: How do I contact my instructor directly?
texts.FAQ:A4: Within each course, you'll find a 'Contact Instructor' section to send a direct message.
texts.Testimonials:Title: What People Are Saying
texts.Testimonials:Q1: tadriccom transformed how we manage our entire school district.
texts.Testimonials:Q2: As a student, I love having all my assignments in one app.
texts.Testimonials:Q3: The best educational platform I have ever used in my career.
texts.Testimonials:Q4: Streamlined our communication and grading system perfectly.
texts.Testimonials:Q5: Incredible support and very intuitive user interface.
texts.Testimonials:Q6: Saved us thousands of hours in reporting and analytics.
